original_text: And the sons of Perez were: of Hezron, the clan of the Hezronites; of Hamul, the clan of the Hamulites.
korean_text: 또 베레스 자손은 이러하니 헤스론에게서 난 헤스론 종족과 하물에게서 난 하물 종족이라

sentences.original_text: And the sons of Perez were:
of Hezron, the clan of the Hezronites
of Hamul, the clan of the Hamulites.
